Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Kubantu bakwaThamûd Sathumela umzalwana wabo uSâlih6, Wathi kubo: “Hini na bantu bakuthi! Nqulani uAllâh! Aninathixo wumbi ngaphandle kwaKhe. Inene umqondiso ocacileyo ufikile7 kuni, uvela eNkosini yenu. Le mazi yenkamela ka-Allâh ngumqondiso kuni; ke ngoko yiyekeni izidlele ingca emhlabeni ka-Allâh; ningayichukumisi ngabubi,(kuba) hleze nihlelwe sisohlwayo esikhulu

Yabonani Yena Wanenza ukuba nibe ngabalandeli babantu bakwa-’Ad, Waninika iindawo zokuhlala emhlabeni, nazakhela iindawo emathafeni, naqingqa izindlu (zenu) ezintabeni. Ke kaloku khumbulani iziBele zika-Allâh, kananjalo ningahambi nisenza ubutshinga emhlabeni.”

Iinkokeli zabo babezizikhukhumali phakathi kwabantu bakubo zathi kwabo babethathwa ukuba abanamandla ababekholwa: “Ingaba niyayazi na into yokuba uSâlih ungumntu othunyiweyo ovela eNkosini yakhe?” Bathi bona: “Siyakholwa thina ngenene kuko oko akuthunyiweyo.”
Abo babezizikhukhumali bathi: “Inene, thina asikholwa koko nikholwa kuko nina.”
Bayinqumla imisipha ke, (bayibulala) imazi yenkamela baba nendelelo, abawuthobela umyalelo weNkosi yabo, bathi: “Wena Sâlih! Yiza kaloku nezoyikiso zakho ukuba ungomnye wabaThunywa (baka-Allâh).”
Ke kaloku inyikima yabafumana, balala (bafa) waca badunduluza emizini yabo
USâlih wemka kubo, wathi: “Hini na bantu bakuthi! Mna ndiwuvakalisile ngenene uMyalezo weNkosi yam, ndaninika icebiso elilungileyo kodwa nina anibathandi abacebisi abalungileyo
Kananjalo uLût wathi kubantu bakubo: “Ingaba nenza esona sono sibi esingazanga senziwe mntu kwabangaphambili kuni ehlabathini na
Inene nina nanelisa iinkanuko zenu emadodeni endaweni yabafazi. Inene! Nina ningabantu abagabadele batsiba imida.”
Impendulo yabantu bakubo yaba kukuba bathi: “Bakhupheni nibagxothe bemke esixekweni senu, aba inene ngamadoda afuna ukuzenza ngcwele.”
Ke Thina Samsindisa yena nosapho lwakhe, ngaphandle komfazi wakhe, yena waba ngomnye wabo basala ngasemva
Saza Sathoba imvula (yamatye). Khawujonge ke ukuba saba yintoni na isiphelo sabenzi bokungcola
